overview: Does size really count?  You bet it does buster -- and the bigger the better!  In fact, the HUGER the better, right? Well, huge cock fans, this is your lucky day, because here's a tape packed with monstrous man-meat that's not jut big, not just huge, BUT BIGGER THAN HUGE! The world's leading scientists said it was impossible -- but what the fuck do they know? After all, the proof is in the pud... ...er, pudding.  Sweat-soaked gyms, lust laden locker rooms, gland-packed glory holes... Where else would you expect to find action this hot, this hard, THIS HUGE?
tagline: SIZE IS RELATIVE... MOST OF THE TIME!!!
title: Bigger Than Huge
